Key.Original: Flaps
Key.English: Flaps

Key.Original: Enable landing gear toggle
Key.English: Enable landing gear toggle

Key.Original: Allows the player to toggle an aircraft's landing gear using the ACE interaction menu.
Key.English: Allows the player to toggle an aircraft's landing gear using the ACE interaction menu.

Key.Original: Enable collision light toggle
Key.English: Enable collision light toggle

Key.Original: Allows the player to toggle collision lights using the ACE interaction menu.
Key.English: Allows the player to toggle collision lights using the ACE interaction menu.

Key.Original: Enable head light toggle
Key.English: Enable head light toggle

Key.Original: Allows the player to toggle head lights using the ACE interaction menu.
Key.English: Allows the player to toggle head lights using the ACE interaction menu.

Key.Original: Enable auto-hover toggle
Key.English: Enable auto-hover toggle

Key.Original: Allows the player to toggle auto-hover using the ACE interaction menu.
Key.English: Allows the player to toggle auto-hover using the ACE interaction menu.

Key.Original: Enable manual fire toggle
Key.English: Enable manual fire toggle

Key.Original: Allows the player to toggle manual fire using the ACE interaction menu.
Key.English: Allows the player to toggle manual fire using the ACE interaction menu.

Key.Original: Enable engine on/off toggle
Key.English: Enable engine on/off toggle

Key.Original: Allows the player to toggle engine state using the ACE interaction menu.
Key.English: Allows the player to toggle engine state using the ACE interaction menu.

Key.Original: Enable flaps control
Key.English: Enable flaps control

Key.Original: Allows the player to control flaps using the ACE interaction menu.
Key.English: Allows the player to control flaps using the ACE interaction menu.

Key.Original: Show custom component toggles
Key.English: Show custom component toggles

Key.Original: Such as helicopter doors, ramps etc.
Key.English: Such as helicopter doors, ramps etc.

Key.Original: Add artillery computer to interaction menu
Key.English: Add artillery computer to interaction menu

Key.Original: Allows the player to access the artillery computer using the ACE interaction menu.
Key.English: Allows the player to access the artillery computer using the ACE interaction menu.

Key.Original: Enable locking controls for helicopters
Key.English: Enable locking controls for helicopters

Key.Original: Allows the player to lock controls using the ACE interaction menu.
Key.English: Allows the player to lock controls using the ACE interaction menu.

Key.Original: Enable taking controls for helicopters
Key.English: Enable taking controls for helicopters

Key.Original: Allows the player to take controls using the ACE interaction menu.
Key.English: Allows the player to take controls using the ACE interaction menu.
